title: One More Sneaky Teaser for the Philippous' 'Bring Her Back' Horror
description: "Did I do it right?" Prepare to be scared. A24 has debuted another new teaser trailer for the disquieting new horror Bring Her Back, the latest creation from the brothers Danny & Michael Philippou - the Australian filmmakers (also called RackaRacka) who brought us Talk To Me. Described as "visceral new horror" and the only synopsis so far states: "A brother and sister uncover a terrifying ritual at the secluded home of their new foster mother." What is she up to with them? Who is she trying to bring back and why? This looks like it's going to get extra dark & freaky (view the full trailer). Bring Her Back stars Sally Hawkins, with Billy Barrat, Sora Wong, Jonah Wren Phillips, Sally-Anne Upton, & Stephen Phillips. Ready for a late summer 2025 release at the end of May coming up very soon. This is looking creepier and creepier the more they show. The cat from the first teaser makes an appearance in this trailer, which is much more unsettling. Here's the Easter promo teaser for Danny & Michael Philippous' horror Bring Her Back, from YouTube: You can watch the intiial teaser for the Philippous' Bring Her Back right here or [â€¦]
author: Alex Billington

text: TRAILERS by April 20, 2025Source: YouTube "Did I do it right?" Prepare to be scared. A24 has debuted another new teaser trailer for the disquieting new horror Bring Her Back, the latest creation from the brothers Danny & Michael Philippou - the Australian filmmakers (also called RackaRacka) who brought us Talk To Me. Described as "visceral new horror" and the only synopsis so far states: "A brother and sister uncover a terrifying ritual at the secluded home of their new foster mother." What is she up to with them? Who is she trying to bring back and why? This looks like it's going to get extra dark & freaky (view the full trailer). Bring Her Back stars Sally Hawkins, with Billy Barrat, Sora Wong, Jonah Wren Phillips, Sally-Anne Upton, & Stephen Phillips. Ready for a late summer 2025 release at the end of May coming up very soon. This is looking creepier and creepier the more they show. The cat from the first teaser makes an appearance in this trailer, which is much more unsettling. Here's the Easter promo teaser for Danny & Michael Philippous' horror Bring Her Back, from YouTube: You can watch the intiial teaser for the Philippous' Bring Her Back right here or the full official trailer here. A brother and sister uncover a terrifying ritual at the secluded home of their new foster mother (starring Sally Hawkins). Bring Her Back is co-directed by the acclaimed Australian filmmaking brothers Danny Philippou & Michael Philippou, making their second feature film after directing the horror hit Talk to Me previously, plus many other YouTube short films before. The screenplay is written by Bill Hinzman and Danny Philippou. Produced by Kristina Ceyton & Samantha Jennings. Filmed in & around Adelaide, South Australia. Made by A24, Causeway Films, RackaRacka Studios, SAFC Studios, Salmira Productions, & Sony Pictures Releasing. A24 releases Bring Her Back in theaters starting May 30th, 2025. Are you scared yet? html:
TRAILERS

by
April 20, 2025
Source: YouTube

"Did I do it right?" Prepare to be scared. A24 has debuted another new teaser trailer for the disquieting new horror Bring Her Back, the latest creation from the brothers Danny & Michael Philippou - the Australian filmmakers (also called RackaRacka) who brought us Talk To Me. Described as "visceral new horror" and the only synopsis so far states: "A brother and sister uncover a terrifying ritual at the secluded home of their new foster mother." What is she up to with them? Who is she trying to bring back and why? This looks like it's going to get extra dark & freaky (view the full trailer). Bring Her Back stars Sally Hawkins, with Billy Barrat, Sora Wong, Jonah Wren Phillips, Sally-Anne Upton, & Stephen Phillips. Ready for a late summer 2025 release at the end of May coming up very soon. This is looking creepier and creepier the more they show. The cat from the first teaser makes an appearance in this trailer, which is much more unsettling.

Here's the Easter promo teaser for Danny & Michael Philippous' horror Bring Her Back, from YouTube:

You can watch the intiial teaser for the Philippous' Bring Her Back right here or the full official trailer here.

A brother and sister uncover a terrifying ritual at the secluded home of their new foster mother (starring Sally Hawkins). Bring Her Back is co-directed by the acclaimed Australian filmmaking brothers Danny Philippou & Michael Philippou, making their second feature film after directing the horror hit Talk to Me previously, plus many other YouTube short films before. The screenplay is written by Bill Hinzman and Danny Philippou. Produced by Kristina Ceyton & Samantha Jennings. Filmed in & around Adelaide, South Australia. Made by A24, Causeway Films, RackaRacka Studios, SAFC Studios, Salmira Productions, & Sony Pictures Releasing. A24 releases Bring Her Back in theaters starting May 30th, 2025. Are you scared yet?

Find more posts in: Horror, To Watch, Trailer
